website.title: Official Masari Web Wallet
website.description: Official online wallet for Masari currency - anonymous, secured, and fully handled in your browser for optimal security

homepage.tagLine: The simplest way to use Masari - anywhere and any time

technology.title: Unique Technology

historyBlock.emptyWallet: You currently have no funds in this wallet.

historyBlock.beReallyPatient: The initial setup can take some time...

newPassword.label: Choose a new password to protect your wallet

finalizationStep.title: That was simple. Your account is ready!
finalizationStep.subtitle: Be ready to use Masari like you never have

backupBlock.title: Save your private credentials for recovery.
backupBlock.confirmManuallyWritten: I wrote my seed phrase down
backupBlock.warningMessage:
**Do not lose it!** It cannot be recovered if you lose it.
**Do not share it!** Your funds will be stolen if you use this file or seed on a malicious/phishing site.
**Make a backup!** Secure it like the millions of dollars it may one day be worth.

disclaimerBlock.title: Risk of Using MasariWallet
disclaimerBlock.content:
MasariWallet is a web-based interface. It helps you use Masari without running a full Masari node.
We recommend you treat MasariWallet like you will treat your actual wallet.

donatePage.title: Donate
donatePage.subtitle: Help to fund the development and pay the bills

webwalletBlock.title: Webwallet
webwalletBlock.content:
This Web wallet is developed by Gnock on his free time.
If you want to help the development, help to pay for the servers, and like this app, please consider a donation:

masariFundBlock.title: Masari Dev fund
masariFundBlock.content: To help Masari, you can donate at these addresses

getInTouchBlock.title: Let's Get In Touch!
getInTouchBlock.content: Do you have ideas or feedback that could help us improve the wallet? Contact us!

warningBlock.title: Warning
warningBlock.content:
If you choose to save your private keys or your mnemonic phrase, PLEASE DO NOT store them in clear-text for your own safety.
The file is an alternate solution where your keys are encrypted and contains a backup of all your transactions to spare you a future synchronisation.

walletKeysModal.title: Private keys
walletKeysModal.content:
Please carefully store these keys. Possessing them means possessing the funds associated !
Spend key: {privSpendKey}
Private view key: {privViewKey}

mnemonicKeyModal.title: Mnemonic phrase
mnemonicKeyModal.content:
Please store carefully this mnemonic phrase. Possessing it means possessing the funds associated ! The phrase is:
{mnemonic}
